descr: "A statement of relationships from one set of concepts to one or more other concepts - either code systems or data elements, or classes in class models."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ConceptMap resource"

fields.name: url
fields.descr: "An absolute URI that is used to identify this concept map when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this concept map is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the concept map. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions)."

fields.name: _url
fields.descr: "Extensions for url"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A formal identifier that is used to identify this concept map when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance."

fields.name: version
fields.descr: "The identifier that is used to identify this version of the concept map when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the concept map author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence."

fields.name: _version
fields.descr: "Extensions for version"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A natural language name identifying the concept map. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the concept map."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of this concept map. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: experimental
fields.descr: "A boolean value to indicate that this concept map is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage."

fields.name: _experimental
fields.descr: "Extensions for experimental"

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date  (and optionally time) when the concept map was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the concept map changes."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: publisher
fields.descr: "The name of the individual or organization that published the concept map."

fields.name: _publisher
fields.descr: "Extensions for publisher"

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A free text natural language description of the concept map from a consumer's perspective."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: useContext
fields.descr: "The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate concept map instances."

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.descr: "A legal or geographic region in which the concept map is intended to be used."

fields.name: purpose
fields.descr: "Explaination of why this concept map is needed and why it has been designed as it has."

fields.name: _purpose
fields.descr: "Extensions for purpose"

fields.name: copyright
fields.descr: "A copyright statement relating to the concept map and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the concept map."

fields.name: _copyright
fields.descr: "Extensions for copyright"

fields.name: sourceUri
fields.descr: "The source value set that specifies the concepts that are being mapped."

fields.name: _sourceUri
fields.descr: "Extensions for sourceUri"

fields.name: sourceReference
fields.descr: "The source value set that specifies the concepts that are being mapped."

fields.name: targetUri
fields.descr: "The target value set provides context to the mappings. Note that the mapping is made between concepts, not between value sets, but the value set provides important context about how the concept mapping choices are made."

fields.name: _targetUri
fields.descr: "Extensions for targetUri"

fields.name: targetReference
fields.descr: "The target value set provides context to the mappings. Note that the mapping is made between concepts, not between value sets, but the value set provides important context about how the concept mapping choices are made."

fields.name: group
fields.descr: "A group of mappings that all have the same source and target system."
